Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task with its details, index, and completion status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

urgencia.description: Numerical value representing the urgency of the task.

necesidad.description: Numerical value representing the necessity of the task.

costo.description: Numerical value representing the cost of the task.

duracion.description: Numerical value representing the duration of the task.

indice.description: Calculated index of the task, used for sorting.

completado.description: Boolean value indicating whether the task is completed or not.

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was completed.

isFenix.description: Indicates if the task should automatically be reborn after completion.

fenixPeriod.description: The period in days after which a Fenix task should be reborn.

SubTask.title: SubTask
SubTask.description: Represents a sub-task linked to a parent task.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SubTask entity.

parentId.description: The ID of the parent Task.

completado.description: Boolean value indicating whether the sub-task is completed or not.

definition.description: Stores tasks for a specific user.
Stores sub-tasks for a specific task.
